text: Sal is an island in Cape Verde. Sal is a tourist destination with white sandy beaches and over 350 days of sunshine a year. The island was discovered on 3 December 1460. The island is home to Am√≠lcar Cabral International Airport, the busiest airport of Cape Verde. The main port of the island is at Palmeira. == Municipality == Administratively, the island of Sal is covered by one municipality. Espargos is the capital city. Category:Islands of Cape Verde Category:Municipalities of Cape Verde
title: Sal, Cape Verde
